I was walking towards home when I notice a garage sale. I walk to the driveway and I saw the house was for sale. I walk down to the driveway and saw a lot of old stuff. I look for something unreal or one of a kind. Then I found a golden thick ring with a hippopotamus on it. It have a huge belly on it like it was pregnant. It have ancient Egyptian glyph on it. “The ring is free. I forgot to ask your name?”

“Katherine is the name. Kat to friends. Thank you for the ring and here five dollar for the ring. Then I started to walk home.

Half way walking back home I decided to try the ring on my finger. The next thing I know the whole world turn black.

The world I knew was gone, like god turn off the sun with a light switch. I know I’m still can see but nothing. I hear myself breathing. The next think I knew the light was back on. I manage to stop. The carpet was no more so I have to stop. The room where I stop was full of people well all woman and no men. I saw what it look like an ancient Egyptian party. “I do want to know how you know my name?” That a good question.

“When you put on the ring I knew who you are. I show you who I am.”

As the woman finish talking I saw her shadow from the curtains and she was walking towards them. The curtains open and my mouth was on the floor like those cartoon when they saw a hot babe. She was black hair lightly tan. Egyptian make-up, the breast was the size of a VW beetle and the woman was extremely pregnant. The woman belly was a perfect sphere. Her belly is the size of two city bus and the weird part is (beside that she naked, no amount of clothes can cover that belly and breast) that she still can walk. She waddle to me and I said the most stupid thing to say to a pregnant woman in the universe.

“If you go in labor, It will be a flood and I will drown.” I clap with both of my hand to don’t say another word. Every woman in the room look at me and the only sound is chuckles from the pregnant woman. “That was the fist time in thousands of years I laugh. The name is Tawaret. I am the Egyptian’s goddess of pregnancy and childbirth.”

That explains the breast and the belly. I see the babies kicking though the skin. She is immortal, she look at the age of 19. I have to ask Tawaret a few questions. I hope she don’t mind.

“Where am I?”

“Your in the ring that contain everything about me. Any woman who wear the ring, with my aid and I show you my powers.”

“That like your permission right?”

“Yes it is. Before you ask another question. You want to know about my powers?” I nodded. Tawaret smile. Five woman from nowhere appear on the steps, they have cloth cover breast and pelvic area, it like the first bikini.

“These servant will help me to show you the extent of my power.” They undo the cloth cover the breast. The servants breasts was in the state of expansion. Now I feel envy for them from being flat as a board to the size of DD. “I can increase the breast size to any size you wish. I can’t create pregnancy, but I can create the illusion of the pregnancy until I steal the real one for you.” What did Tawaret mean by steal the real pregnancy? “I can transfer the pregnancy from person to person. The person who had the pregnancy transfer won’t remember being pregnant and any proof of it will vanish. When the pregnancy return to the person the memory will return and the evince will come back. I help the body by strengthen the back and legs to help you carry the babies. I also prevent the childbirth or labor for as long as I want.” Prevent labor?

“What do you mean prevent labor?” I said with a question.

“I can extended the pregnancy from the normal to as long as I want. The babies will grow older inside you and stay pregnant. “How do you unlock it?” It was a good question.

“By using my powers. When I grow strong enough I can unlock my powers one by one. Outside the ring I can talk inside your head and use your five essence.” Essence? Does she mean?

“Sight, hearing, touch, taste and smell? That do you mean by essence?”

Tawaret nodded and smile. “You are ready with my help to the world. I will learn what you will see and gain from your memories from objects I don’t know. In the ring it been a hour when you enter, outside it been a moment. I hope you don’t trip when you return to the world.” Tawaret wave and the very second she stop waving I was back on the sidewalk. I look at my watch and it was a few seconds gone. “HELLO KAT!” I heard Tawaret scream in my mind and I jump. Unluckily for the dog owner bark at the same time that Tawaret scare the crap out of me. The man said he was sorry and I told the owner that I was thinking of history in my head. The guy walk away. I heard laughing and I have to talk like a mind reader.

Now that Kat was back to her baby free figure she decided to get ready for her day. She got out of bed ready to tackle the day, as she walked into the bathroom she caught a glimpse of herself in the mirror. What she saw made her feel really confused, she was free of a baby bump but somehow she just felt empty. She pushed such thoughts out of her head and proceeded to get ready to shower. As she showed Kat still felt a bit off and wanted to try to put yesterday's events behind her, so as she finished drying off she looked down at her ring. The ring that had introduced her to Tawaret, the ring that had caused this whole mess, she quickly grabbed it and tryed to yank it off. To Kat's surprise nothing happened the ring was stuck, so she pulled harder and still nothing. "Hey sweetie I know that yesterday was tough but you don't have to try to throw me away like that." Kat almost forgot that the goddess living in the ring could see what she did and hear what she thought. "Why won't you let me take the ring off Tawaret what gives"Kat asked the goddess frantically. "Oh that's not my doing dear there is some other force acting on the ring I'm currently shoved in."

"What do you mean some other force and what do you mean shoved in the ring?" Kat wasn't liking how this was going she couldn't remove the ring and she was definitely starting to feel empty again. "Why yes dear I have no idea how I got trapped in this ring. I'm a goddess after all, I'm not supposed to be in an object. I'm supposed to be sitting on a throne in my palace. This has to be the work of a magic user and a strong one at that, but who knows why they did this." Kat was now sitting on her bed naked her flat stomach still glistening with water. "So you're telling me that you don't know how you're in the ring and for what reason."

"Well not exactly I know why I'm in 'this' ring, it's the one my priestesses used to contact me but that was a long time ago. When you first got this ring I thought I was just weak, which I was and still am. But I thought I could leave with enough power, that seems to not be the case since I'm still here. The more troublesome fact is that you seem to have bonded with the ring. I don't know why or how, but something tells me we will find out." Tawaret had a slight edge to her voice as if she was a little worried about what was happening. "Ok well I'll just have to see what happens in the mean time I'm starving."

With that Kat headed downstairs to see if Alyxis was up and hoped her mom had made breakfast. Walking into the kitchen Kat was met with a note 'Kat went to IHOP with your sister be back later - love mom XOXO'. "Well that figures I guess I'll eat and then go for a jog." Kat poured her a bowl of cereal and ate while watching some tv. Finished with her breakfast and show Kat decides to get dressed for a jog. She grabs a pair of yoga pants and a tank top, as she's getting dressed she spots the dress she had used last night on the floor. She felt herself get a little arroused at the idea of being that big but quickly shoved the dress under her bed and headed out the door.

It was a great day for a jog the sun was out the sky had some nice clouds that would help shade her from time to time. She headed towards the park and the jogging trails. Halfway through the trail she stops to take a break and rest, sitting on a bench she leans her head back and sighs. She is startled by a woman coming up behind her and talking. "Oh it can't be that bad dear, you're nice and thin jogging is a breeze." Kat looked up at the woman to see who could have made that comment and was met with a very pregnant woman. "Oh uh yea definitely not as hard as you're having miss, you look huge." Kat slapped her palm to her four head that was embarrassing. "Hahaha yeah I am quit large, but I'm due anyday with twins so I should be. I'm actually trying to walk to induce labor." Kat was happy the woman seemed to be very kind and the more may looked at her round belly the sexier she looked too. "I'm sorry I'm so ditzy sometimes you look beautiful."

"Well thank you for saying that. I'll be off now, I am ready to get this huge load off my back for a while." With those words Kat couldn't take it anymore. "Tawaret I want those babies no I need to feel them in me." With that the woman started to deflate and Kat ballooned through the months. Finally settling on nine months with twins. She felt so good but to her dismay the tank top she had on rode up her huge belly and the yoga pants she had started to feel overly tight. Coming down from her expansion high the reality of what she had just done started to sink in. "What am I doing I can't de taking babies I'm only eighteen I look like a whale." Kat was freaking out why was she doing this she needed to control herself.

Kat got up and easily waddled her way home, the ring thankfully makes walking easier with Tawaret's blessing.

Her name is Lana and she is an above average beauty with a firm ass and C cup breasts. She has a toned stomach and legs. Her face is quit warm and inviting with brown hair and blue eyes she easily has a calming effect on people. She weighs in at about 120 pounds and is slim for a five foot six inch tall woman.
